document.full_text: its brand somewhat adrift, gap has appointed, for the first time, a chief global marketing officer. the executive, seth farbman, comes directly from ogilvy & mather worldwide.
document.title: advertising: gap seeks to freshen itself as a 'people's brand'
lines_and_colors: its brand somewhat adrift, gap has appointed, for the first time, a chief global marketing officer. the executive, seth farbman, comes directly from ogilvy & mather worldwide.
